message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a steal at $13,000. I know you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. However, $9,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,250 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me there?
